solution_line_template: If Divya is currently {divya_current_age} years old, she will be {divya_current_age}+{years_in_future} = <<{divya_current_age}+{years_in_future}={divya_age_in_future}>>{divya_age_in_future} years old in five years.

Since in 5 years Nacho will be three times older than Divya, he will be {nacho_age_multiplier}*{divya_age_in_future} = <<{nacho_age_multiplier}*{divya_age_in_future}={nacho_age_difference_in_future}>>{nacho_age_difference_in_future} years older than Divya.

Nacho's total age in five years will be {nacho_age_difference_in_future}+{divya_age_in_future} = <<{nacho_age_difference_in_future}+{divya_age_in_future}={nacho_total_age_in_future}>>{nacho_total_age_in_future} years.
The sum of Divya and Nacho's age now is {nacho_current_age}+{divya_current_age} = <<{nacho_current_age}+{divya_current_age}={sum_of_current_ages}>>{sum_of_current_ages} years
